instruction: As a publicly traded California-based company, you need to ensure that your board has at least one female director by the end of this year. Please provide a plan of action to meet this requirement.
output: Thank you for bringing this requirement to our attention. We are committed to increasing diversity on our board and ensuring that we comply with the new law. To meet the requirement of having at least one female director by the end of this year, we plan to review our current board composition and identify qualified female candidates. We will also seek out and engage with external networks that focus on advancing women in leadership roles to source potential candidates. Our goal is to have a diverse and representative board that will steer our company towards innovation and long-term success.
